name: New Doctor
description:
New Doctor

You play as a new doctor in an old hospital who needs to cure all the patients. But it is necessary to choose the right medicines for patients. You're a new doctor..

Features
  • Pick the right medications
  • There are 2 attempts to mix up medications.
  • Save people's lives.
Management
  • To cure the patient - go to the bed and press E.
  • press ESC to quickly exit the treatment menu.

Discord server - https://discord.gg/RTRnzgBj55
